Dear Sir / Madam, It has been observed that proposals for and collection of user fee are not submitted by the PIUs' in time as per Circular No 16 dt 21.04.2003, which results into delay in commencement of collection of User Fee and   subsequent revenue loss This issue of revenue loss has been viewed seriously by Public Accounts Committee (PAC) in its report 2009-10. As per Fee Rules, 2008, collection of user fee must start within 45 from the date of completion of the section. From the Monthly Progress Report, it has been observed that number of sections have been   completed above 90% but no proposal has been received in CO Div. for publication of Fee Notification If the Project Director observes that although the whole section is not completed but substantial length is completed in all respect and the same can be tolled, proposal may be submitted for the completed length accordingly. To identify the sections which can be tolled, You are requested to provide the monthly status of  completion of  all such sections which are completed above 90% in the enclosed line   diagram format: Please also provide the date when the section reached /will reach 90% status: Please treat the issue as most urgent and kindly provide the information  within 3-days through e mail: (J S CGM (CM) All Project Directors, CC 1 All ROs: With the request to review the status of tolling and identify sections which can be tolled immediately and within next two three months. 2.
